name: White Elephant
description:
An experimental project I played with, White Elephant allows you to fly around and paint the environment. Yes, it was it literal and figurative "white elephant" gift.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look Around

Click - Paint

Space - Tap to Jump, Double Tap to Activate/Deactivate Flying

Number Keys - Change Color

"+/=" - Randomize Colors

... And other secrets
